page.title: 19THE WINDSURFING CENTRE
page.content:
SeaBreeze Windsurfing Company has been operating on the West Sands for the last three Years. The company is owned by Stuart Clumpas and is part of Total Entertainments Company which runs a wide variety of leisure enterprises. The company shares a site with the St,Andrews Sand Yacht Club. There are 8 boards for hire of various makes, which cater for all standards of boardsailors from beginners to very advanced. Instruction is given and a rescue boat is in attendance.The centre is open every day from early July to the end of the summer season.
Charges in 1985 : Hire of Board & Wetsuit; Â£4.50 for 1hr; Â£7 for 2 hrs; Â£15 for a full day. Instruction Fee; Â£2 per hour.
